categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Around 3642 BBY, during the Cold War, the reconstituted Sith Empire orchestrated an attack on the Valor-class cruiser Fortitude, which served as the meeting place for the members of the Rift Alliance separatist group. The members of the Rift Alliance were rescued by the newly-christened Barsen'thor of the Jedi Order.
